description: This file contains a React component for the login page of an alumni management system frontend. It handles user input for email and password, manages authentication via context, and performs navigation upon login success or failure.

methods.name: LoginPage()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the login page UI, handling user authentication flow.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function handling form submission to authenticate user and redirect upon success.
